vehicles.description: A concrete mixer truck appears to be on the same road as our vehicle, occupying the adjacent lane on the left.
vehicles.explanation: Due to its relatively large size, it may obstruct the view of the road ahead and the adjacent lanes.

traffic lights.description: Ahead, a traffic light displaying a green signal can be seen.
traffic lights.explanation: The green light allows cars to pass straight through the intersection without stopping.

traffic cones.description: Traffic cones are lined up along the right side of the main lane to guide traffic and reduce the lane width.
traffic cones.explanation: These cones may indicate road construction or lane closures, requiring cautious driving and possibly a reduction in speed.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a concrete mixer truck on the road, positioned in the lane to the left of our vehicle. The presence of this large vehicle may block the view of the road ahead and the adjacent lanes, potentially affecting driving decisions. Additionally, there is a traffic light ahead showing a green signal, which indicates that vehicles are permitted to proceed through the intersection without stopping. Along the right side of the main lane, traffic cones are set up, narrowing the lane and possibly signaling road work or lane closures. Drivers should approach this area with caution and may need to reduce speed to navigate safely. Other categories such as vulnerable road users, traffic signs, barriers, and other objects are not present in this image.

driving_suggestion: Due to the green light ahead, the self-driving car should decelerate and maintain a safe following distance from the concrete mixer truck in the adjacent lane. Furthermore, the self-driving car should pay attention to any signs to understand traffic pattern changes caused by road construction demarcated by traffic cones. Caution should be exercised when driving due to possible obstruction of view and unclear road conditions.

1.description and explanation: This is a large vehicle, specifically a concrete mixer truck, with a rotating drum for mixing concrete components. Its presence indicates that the driver of the ego car should maintain a safe distance to avoid any potential hazards related to the operation of such a heavy commercial vehicle, such as sudden stops or turns.

2.description and explanation: This is a traffic signal displaying a red light which instructs vehicles to stop. The ego car must obey this traffic signal by coming to a complete stop and waiting until the light turns green before proceeding.

3.description and explanation: This is a traffic cone. These are typically used to mark lanes or redirect traffic around road hazards, construction sites, or other temporary obstructions. In the driving scenario, the presence of this cone indicates that the ego car should remain in its current lane and not merge or change to the lane that has been cordoned off. The cone serves as a visual cue to drivers to be cautious and keep their distance from the designated area.
